憹字的基本解释

憹
náo
〔懊（
刼 ）憹〕 a.烦乱，如“如一善，则心中清净宁帖；一恶，则憹憹烦燥。”b.悔恨。

憹
nǎo
古同“恼”。

憹
náng
心乱。

憹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［náo］
［《集韻》奴刀切，平，泥。］
心乱；烦闷。

憹字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　憹； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页404第42
【廣韻】【集韻】?奴冬切，音農。㦀憹，悅也。　又【集韻】濃江切，音?。心亂也。　又【類篇】奴刀切，音猱。懊憹，痛悔也。　又【集韻】乃老切，音腦。與㛴同。【說文】有所恨也。汝南人有所恨曰㛴。或作惱??憹。

憹字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
憹字的起名意思

暂无。

náo
〔regret(
刼)憹] a. Disturbance, such as "If one is good, then the heart is pure and peaceful; if one is evil, then it is boring and irritable." b. Remorse.

Gu Tong "annoyed".

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [náo]
["Jiyun" slave knife cut, flat , mud. ]
Upset; upset.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　憹; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 404 42
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Nudong cut, Yinnong.㦀憹, Yue Ye.　[Jiyun] Nongjiang cut, sound?. Upset also.　[Classes] Slave knife cut, sound. Remorse, regret too.　[Jiyun] is old cut, sound brain. Same as 㛴. [Said the text] I hate it. Runan people hate and say 㛴. Or be annoyed??
Faint
